channel.title: Drop rates
channel.description:
how can i make an item drop more frequently?
[code]#torm demon 8349:70 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 995:20000 14484:1 993:1[/code]
i was told that the 1 makes it a 1% drop rate? if so then where is the amount of the items that drop? and if not then how do i change the drop rate to 1%?

item.title: Drop rates
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Mr Rushed, post:5, topic:425486”]I need help with the drops as well
Dragons don’t drop Dragon Bones how would I make it so they drop it every kill?[/quote]make a method for it in npchandler…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

Needi:

but the items are not droping every kill

add the npc in npcconstants

item.title: Drop rates
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

Needi:

ok the tormented demon is not even droping ashes nor bones… where do i go to add drops or add frequency? i have two NPCdrops files one is .cfg and on is .tsm which one do i use?

NPCConstants.TSM

youll get the npc id and then item ids of the items that drop every kill

Read full topic

item.title: Drop rates
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“Needi, post:1, topic:425486”]how can i make an item drop more frequently?

#torm demon 8349:70 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 995:20000 14484:1 993:1

i was told that the 1 makes it a 1% drop rate? if so then where is the amount of the items that drop? and if not then how do i change the drop rate to 1%?[/quote]
the 8349 is the npc id, the :70 after it is a number on which if it is that number then line 2 will take place, you need a second line under it, 892:42 is item and amount,

torm demon
8349:rareity 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 995:20000 14484:1 993:1
itemid:itemammount

Read full topic
